mapper.insert: insert into house_sell(id, title, date, type, price, admin_price, admin_desc, room_type, floor_now, floor_tot, size, content, image, keyword, address, dong) values (#{id},#{title},now(), #{type},#{price},#{admin_price},#{admin_desc},#{room_type},#{floor_now},#{floor_tot},#{size},#{content},#{image},#{keyword},#{address},#{dong})
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from house_sell
